NG0280:1: zhal nas ki la'i sngags zlos shing *//
NG0280:5: phur pa 'di la dbang zhig skur //
NG0280:6: phur pa 'di la byin gyis rlobs //
NG0280:7: rtags dang mtshan ma dbyung ba dang *//
NG0280:8: rig 'dzin bdag la dngos grub stsol //
NG0280:9: a+om b+hud+d+ha ki li ki la ya ru lu ru lu hu~m b+h+yo hu~m /
NG0280:10: hu~m stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na //
NG0280:11: lho phyogs stong gis 'jig rten na //
NG0280:12: brtan g.yo rtsi shing nags tshal kun //
NG0280:13: kun kyang rin chen phur pa'i lha //
NG0280:14: zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad //
NG0280:16: sdang dang khro dang gshe ba'i tshul //
NG0280:17: phyag drug 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha yis //
NG0280:18: 'gro drug b+ha ga'i dbyings su sbyor //
NG0280:19: zhabs bzhis bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon //
NG0280:23: phur pa 'di la dbang zhig skur //
NG0280:24: phur pa 'di la byin gyis rlobs //
NG0280:25: rtags dang mtshan ma dbyung ba dang *//
NG0280:26: rig 'dzin bdag la dngos grub stsol //
NG0280:27: a+om rat+na ki li ki la ya ru lu ru lu hu~m b+h+yo hu~m /
NG0280:28: hu~m stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na //
NG0280:29: nub phyogs stong gi 'jig rten na //
NG0280:30: brtan g.yo rtsi shing nags tshal kun //
NG0280:31: kun kyang pad+ma phur pa'i lha //
NG0280:32: zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad //
NG0280:34: gshe dang khro dang bzhad pa'i tshul //
NG0280:35: phyag drug 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha yis //
NG0280:36: 'gro drug b+ha ga'i dbyings su sbyor //
NG0280:37: zhabs bzhis bdud bzhi zil gyi gnon //
NG0280:38: zhal nas ki la'i sgra zlos shing *//
NG0280:42: phur pa 'di la dbang zhig skur //
NG0280:43: phur pa 'di la byin gyis rlobs //
NG0280:44: rtags dang mtshan ma dbyung ba dang *//
NG0280:45: rig 'dzin bdag la dngos grub stsol //
NG0280:46: a+om pad+ma ki li ki la ya ru lu ru lu hu~m b+h+yo hu~m /
NG0280:47: hu~m stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na //
NG0280:48: byang phyogs stong gi 'jig rten na //
NG0280:49: brtan g.yo rtsi shing nags tshal kun //
NG0280:50: kun kyang las kyi phur pa'i lha //
NG0280:51: zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad //
NG0280:53: rngam dang bzhad dang khro bo'i tshul //
NG0280:54: phyag drug 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha yis //
NG0280:55: 'gro drug b+ha ga'i dbyings su sbyor //
NG0280:56: zhabs bzhis bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon //
NG0280:57: zhal nas ki la'i sgra zlos shing *//
NG0280:61: phur pa 'di la dbang zhig skur //
NG0280:62: phur pa 'di la byin gyis rlobs //
NG0280:64: dang mtshan ma dbyung ba dang *//
NG0280:65: rig 'dzin bdag la dngos grub stsol //
NG0280:66: a+om karma ki li ki la ya ru lu ru lu hu~m b+h+yo hu~m /
NG0280:67: b+ha ga bde ba'i klong yangs nas //
NG0280:68: mi 'gyur mthing ga'i thugs nyid de //
NG0280:69: thig le dbyer med thugs kyi sku //
NG0280:70: rigs lnga khrag 'thung chos dbyings ngang *//
NG0280:71: dbyings las ma g.yos rnam dag ste //
NG0280:72: e ma ho sras kyi mchog las ma g.yos kyang *//
NG0280:73: b+ha ga'i dbyings las byung ba ste //
NG0280:74: rang bzhin rnam dag khro bo'i sku //
NG0280:75: yang dag pa yi don 'di nyon //
NG0280:76: hu~m yab yum bde klong thig le nas //
NG0280:77: mi shigs byang chub sems kyi hu~m //
NG0280:78: 'joms byed dpal be'u phur pa'i dbyibs //
NG0280:79: thig le yig 'bru rnam pa kun //
NG0280:80: phur pa'i logs la lha bkod nas //
NG0280:81: 'gyur med dbyings kyi ngang nyid las //
NG0280:83: sras kyi mchog gyur phur pa'i tshul //
NG0280:84: zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs byed sku //
NG0280:86: khro dang bzhad dang gshe ba'i tshul //
NG0280:87: phyag drug rgyud drug rtsad nas gcod //
NG0280:88: phyag mtshan mtshon chas 'gro drug sgrol //
NG0280:89: sku smad chu srin phur pa'i dbal //
NG0280:90: rgya mdud nang nas sngags kyi sgra //
NG0280:91: 'brug stong lta bur ldir zhing grags //
NG0280:92: chu srin kha nas me lce 'od //
NG0280:93: glog ltar 'khyug cing stong gsum gsal //
NG0280:94: gdug pa chu srin kha nas ni //
NG0280:96: stong khams gang zhing klu rnams 'dul //
NG0280:97: thugs ka'i dpal be'i dkyil 'khor nas //
NG0280:98: bzhi bcu rtsa bdun lha tshogs gnas //
NG0280:99: dgu la rigs lnga'i khrag 'thung rdzogs //
NG0280:100: ye shes lnga ldan dug lnga 'joms //
NG0280:101: sras kyi thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas //
NG0280:102: bde chen yab yum dbyings su bzhugs //
NG0280:103: khro bo'i sprul pas nam mkha' gang *//
NG0280:104: khro mo'i sprul pas sa gzhi gang *//
NG0280:105: phra men sprul pas bar snang gang *//
NG0280:106: sgo ba'i sprul pas phyogs bcur 'gyed //
NG0280:107: khro bo phra men sgo ba'i tshogs //
NG0280:108: thams cad 'dus pa sras kyi mchog / ma btab tsam na lhun gyis grub //
NG0280:109: btab na lha yang brlag par 'gyur //
NG0280:110: dgra bgegs thig le'i dkyil du ki la ya //
NG0280:111: dug gsum rtsad nas gcod cig ki la ya //
NG0280:112: rgyud drug gnas su sgrol cig ki la ya //
NG0280:113: sems kyi bag chags sbyongs shig ki la ya //
NG0280:114: sems nyid dbyings su bstims shig ki la ya //
NG0280:115: dbyings las bde chen rgyas gyur ki la ya //
NG0280:116: sprul skus 'gro don mdzod cig ki la ya //
NG0280:117: a+om badzra ki li ki la ya sarba big+h+nan bam hu~m hu~m phat /
NG0280:119: sems ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin te //
NG0280:121: cho 'phrul nam mkha'i dbyings la thim //
NG0280:122: rnam rgyal yang dag don 'di nyon //
NG0280:123: thams cad 'dus pa'i sras mchog nyid //
NG0280:124: sbyor sgrol sbyor spor thim pa'i tshe //
NG0280:125: nam mkha'i klong nyid las byung ngo *//
NG0280:126: gdod nas ma skye rang bzhin rnam par dag / srid pa'i phur bu sgrub pa'i @#//
NG0280:128: gzhi dang lam dang 'bras bu nyid //
NG0280:129: dbyer med ngang las yang dag ste //
NG0280:130: dag dang ma dag dbyer med dbyings //
NG0280:131: bsam dang mi bsam brjod du med //
NG0280:132: cho 'phrul sna tshogs cir snang yang *//
NG0280:133: b+ha ga dbyings kyi ngang nyid du //
NG0280:134: thams cad bde ba klong nas shar //
NG0280:135: bsam gyi mi khyab kun las 'das //
NG0280:136: rjod med dbyings kyi thig le che //
NG0280:137: 'gro ba yongs la thams cad khyab //
NG0280:138: skye dang mi skye kun snang yang *//
NG0280:139: yang dag don la rig mi nus //
NG0280:140: phur pa'i rdzas nyid la brten nas //
NG0280:141: phrin las sna tshogs sgrub pa yang *//
NG0280:142: yang dag don la yod ma yin //
NG0280:143: thams cad 'gro ba drang phyir te //
NG0280:144: dri mas dri ma dag byed cing *//
NG0280:146: bskyed pa'i rim pa lha bsgom yang *//
NG0280:147: yang dag don du yod min te //
NG0280:148: snang ba sprul sku sngags brjod med //
NG0280:149: bde chen rgyas par longs spyod nyid //
NG0280:150: dbyings su thim pa chos kyi sku //
NG0280:151: brjod med gnyis su med pa ste //
NG0280:152: brjod du med pa sangs rgyas nyid //
NG0280:153: sngags kyi sgra yang brjod las 'das //
NG0280:154: thig le chen po mi shigs dbus //
NG0280:155: bdag dang bdag med dbyer med nyid //
NG0280:156: gnyis med ye shes rdo rje ste //
NG0280:157: chos sku byang sems gzhon nu nga *//
NG0280:158: srid pa'i 'khor lo phur pa ste //
NG0280:159: mi rtog dbyings kyi rgyas 'debs ma //
NG0280:160: e ka nam mkha'i rang bzhin te //
NG0280:161: dza ni dug chen bde dbyings thim //
NG0280:162: ti ni dug chen rtog med dbyings //
NG0280:163: yab yum byang sems chos sku sras //
NG0280:164: dug thim phur pa brjod bral thim //
NG0280:165: bde chen dug gsum dbyings su thim //
NG0280:166: khro rgyal byang sems zhe sdang 'joms //
NG0280:167: hu~m mdzad dug 'joms thig le lnga //
NG0280:168: dbyings su thim pas thig le ste //
NG0280:169: hu~m gi ye shes dang ldan zhing *//
NG0280:170: ka yis dug lnga 'joms par byed //
NG0280:171: ras ni rnam rtog dbyings su thim //
NG0280:172: yum chen mi phyed rdo rje ste //
NG0280:173: sangs rgyas skyed par byed pa'i yum //
NG0280:175: mi phyed ye shes rdo rje ste //
NG0280:176: sgra 'byin brag cha ltar snang la //
NG0280:177: ma ni sprul pa bskyed pa'i yum //
NG0280:178: sprul pa rol pa 'gag med nyid //
NG0280:179: phag las ma rig mun pa sel //
NG0280:180: smig bus 'dam rdzab skam par byed //
NG0280:182: snang ba mun sel rdo rje snyem //
NG0280:183: snang ba sna tshogs stag gi mgo / bya rgod nam mkha' lta bu ste //
NG0280:184: dbyug pas lta log 'joms byed cing *//
NG0280:185: sngon pos mtshan ma'i rnam rtog 'joms //
NG0280:186: gnyis med rdo rje sder mo rno //
NG0280:187: las rnams mi rtog dbyings su thim //
NG0280:188: g.yag mgo dbyings las 'gyur ba med //
NG0280:189: bya rog chos dbyings rnam par dag / gshin rje gzung 'dzin dag pa dang *//
NG0280:190: dmyal ba'i khams ni dpag med kyang *//
NG0280:191: don dam dbyings la yod ma yin //
NG0280:192: rjes ni chos kyi dbyings su thim //
NG0280:193: dur khrod rol pa dpag med kyang *//
NG0280:194: bdag mo mkha' dbyings rnam par dag / sha ba skye @#//
NG0280:196: 'ug pa shes rab dbyings nyid de //
NG0280:197: lo ka chos brgyad nyid kyi sems //
NG0280:198: rtag tu yengs shing gnas pa yang *//
NG0280:199: rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis //
NG0280:200: mi g.yo thig le nyag cig go / sems can don byed thams cad kyang *//
NG0280:201: dam pa'i dbyings ni mgon yin no //
NG0280:202: rdo rje gnyis med zung 'jug pa //
NG0280:203: gtun khung snang ba 'joms byed ma //
NG0280:204: don dam nyid las ma g.yos kyang *//
NG0280:205: thig le nyag gcig gzigs gi mgo / kha twa nam mkha' lta bur khyab //
NG0280:206: rta mgrin rta skad sgra snyan lta bu ste //
NG0280:207: rdo rje stong pa'i ngang nyid kyis /
NG0280:208: khro bar snang bas gtum mo'o //
NG0280:210: pu shud bzang ngan rnam rtog med //
NG0280:211: don dam nyid las yod ma yin //
NG0280:212: nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs rnams //
NG0280:213: rtog med mkha' dbyings gzhan mi thub //
NG0280:214: mi shigs rdo rje 'bigs byed mda' //
NG0280:215: mtshan ma 'joms par byed snyem ma //
NG0280:216: spyang ka'i mgo ni ye sangs rgyas //
NG0280:217: rnam rtog phra mo sems byed kyang *//
NG0280:218: yang dag nyid blta khra yi mgo / bdud ni bzhi por snang byed pa //
NG0280:219: rtsi yis mi shigs klong du thim //
NG0280:220: 'khyil pa bde ba chen po'i ngang *//
NG0280:221: gcig dang du ma dang bral zhing *//
NG0280:222: rtog med dbyings ni rlung 'byin ma //
NG0280:223: nyi ma lta bu'i gzi brjid kyis //
NG0280:224: mun pa'i tshogs 'joms seng ge'i mgo / yod med gnyis las 'das pa yis //
NG0280:225: mtha' gnyis bral ba pha wang mgo / lus ngag yid gsum snang ba yang *//
NG0280:226: don dam nyid la yod min te //
NG0280:229: gzung 'dzin rtogs pa shes pa gsod //
NG0280:230: pha rol phyin pa yin pa ste //
NG0280:231: spyod pa brlang po dom gyi mgo / gang du
NG0280:232: mi gnas sre mo'i mgo / don dam bden pas
NG0280:233: sems can gyi // nyon mongs stob byed stobs po che //
NG0280:234: rdo rje don dam bden pa ste //
NG0280:235: dag pa mkha' dbyings klong du bskyod //
NG0280:236: bud+d+ha skyed pa'i yum yin ma //
NG0280:237: ye shes thogs med dred kyi mgo / log pa'i lam zhugs sum byed cing *//
NG0280:238: de bzhin nyid gnas byi la'i mgo / snang ba stong pas 'gugs byed ma //
NG0280:239: lcags kyus ye shes sa la dgod //
NG0280:240: stong pa bco brgyad zhags pa yis //
NG0280:241: mi rtog rtog pa 'ching byed ma //
NG0280:242: yod dam med pa'i phyogs spangs shing *//
NG0280:243: snying rjes mi phyed lcags sgrog ma //
NG0280:244: stong pa nyid kyi sgra sgrogs pas //
NG0280:245: mtshan ma'i rnam par rtog pa 'joms //
NG0280:246: shes rab pha rol phyin ma nyid //
NG0280:247: gzung 'dzin dang bral dril bu ma //
NG0280:248: sa ni thams cad kun gyi rten //
NG0280:249: de bzhin lta ba kun gyi gzhi //
NG0280:250: de ni gang du'ang ma grub pa //
NG0280:251: bsam dang brjod pa'i yul las 'das //
NG0280:252: me yis sreg par byed pa ste //
NG0280:253: lha yi mtshan ma de bzhin nyid //
NG0280:254: chu yis sdud par byed pa ste //
NG0280:255: chu ltar snang ba'i sna tshogs kyang *//
NG0280:256: de bzhin nyid las byung nas @#//
NG0280:258: slar yang de bzhin nyid la thim //
NG0280:259: rlung gis g.yo bar byed pa nyid *//
NG0280:260: rlung g.yos chu dang sprin las kyang *//
NG0280:261: sems can kun gyi don la g.yo //
NG0280:262: nam mkha' go 'byed kun la khyab //
NG0280:263: cho 'phrul dam pa'i dbyings la thim //
NG0280:264: log lta 'joms byed don la spyod //
NG0280:265: yang dag don la spyod pa gyis //
NG0280:266: nyi mas mun sel rnam rtog thim //
NG0280:267: nyi mas mun sel 'joms byed cing *//
NG0280:268: mtshan ma'i rnam par rtog pa rnams //
NG0280:269: ye shes dbyings kyi ngang du thim //
NG0280:270: zla ba chu shel grub pa nyid //
NG0280:271: zla ba dug gsum gdung ba sel //
NG0280:272: nyi shu nye ba'i nyon mongs rnams //
NG0280:273: dbyings las ma 'das thig le nyid //
NG0280:274: de bzhin re skong skur snang yang *//
NG0280:275: rin chen dgos 'dod re ba skong *//
NG0280:276: gdul bya'i don du skur snang yang *//
NG0280:277: yang dag dbyings las ma g.yos so //
NG0280:278: dpag bsam shing gis don rnams 'grub //
NG0280:279: yang dag don la gang dmigs pa //
NG0280:280: don dam myur du rtogs par 'gyur //
NG0280:282: pad+ma skyon gyis ma gos te //
NG0280:284: yod med gnyis su mi gnas shing *//
NG0280:285: dbyer med bag nas yang dag lta //
NG0280:286: nam mkha' sa chu mi gnas pa'i //
NG0280:287: tshad med bzhi la gnas nas kyang *//
NG0280:288: phyag rgya bzhi rdzogs thig le gcig / yang dag don dang ldan gyur na //
NG0280:289: thig le nyag gcig brjod dang bral //
NG0280:291: sems can tham cad bud+d+ha yang *//
NG0280:292: glo bur dri mas sems can bsgribs //
NG0280:293: nam mkha' chu gser lta bur dag / yang dag lta mthong rnam par grol //
NG0280:294: gzugs sku rnam gnyis 'ja' lta bu //
NG0280:295: gzugs brnyan lta bur snang gyur kyang *//
NG0280:296: yang dag don la reg ma yin //
NG0280:297: nam mkha' nyid las sprin byung ltar //
NG0280:298: 'khrul rtog don rtogs gnyis med lta //
NG0280:299: ji ltar sprin rnams sna tshogs kyang *//
NG0280:300: nam mkha' nyid las byung ltar thim //
NG0280:302: 'khrul zhing rtogs pa'i gang zag blun //
NG0280:303: yang dag lta ba nyid mthong na //
NG0280:304: dbyer med pa yi ngang la gnas //
NG0280:305: de yang smra bsam brjod med brda //
NG0280:306: yod med mtshan mar 'dzin dang bral //
NG0280:307: mtha' gnyis gang du mi gnas pa //
NG0280:308: yang dag lta ba gzung bar byos //
NG0280:309: de rtogs pa yi gang zag rnams //
NG0280:310: 'chi ba zhes ni rnam rtog ste //
NG0280:312: dkyil gsum bdag nyid brjod las 'das //
NG0280:313: gang du mi gnas lta spyod sgom pa'o //
NG0280:314: tha snyad mtshan mar 'dzin pa gang brjod rnams //
NG0280:315: gang du ma grub 'dir ni brjod pa min //
NG0280:316: 'gyur med dag pa'i sems rang bzhin //
NG0280:317: sems ni gang du gnas pa'ang med //
NG0280:318: de rtogs pa yi gang zag rnams //
NG0280:319: thugs kyi rigs la gnas par 'gyur //
NG0280:320: rdo rje'i rigs su mngon sangs rgya //
NG0280:321: nga yis bstan pas mngon sangs rgyas //
NG0280:322: sems can dug lnga rgyas pa'i dus //
NG0280:323: drag po'i las kyi tshar gcod @#//
NG0280:325: sngags la sbyangs pas rgyal po'i rigs //
NG0280:326: pad+ma las skyes skye ba dran //
NG0280:327: spyod pa sna tshogs byas gyur nas //
NG0280:328: mkha' 'gro ma yi lung bstan thob //
NG0280:330: zhe sdang rdo rje'i rigs yin no //
NG0280:331: rdo rje khrag 'thung ngang nyid kyis //
NG0280:332: chos la rtag tu sgrub 'gyur zhing *//
NG0280:334: 'di la brten pa'i gang zag rnams //
NG0280:335: thams cad grol 'gyur the tshom med //
NG0280:336: rdo rje khrag 'thung nga nyid kyis //
NG0280:337: yi ge hu~m tsam bzlas pa yang *//
NG0280:338: bar chod bdud kyis mi tshugs shing *//
NG0280:339: mtshan ma grub par the tshom med //
NG0280:340: rdo rje can gyi zhing du skye //
NG0280:341: lha klu kun la dbang byed 'gyur //
NG0280:342: 'di sgrub pa yi gang zag rnams //
NG0280:343: snga nas sbyangs par the tshom med //
NG0280:344: tshe gcig 'di la brtson ldan pas //
NG0280:345: 'khor bar mi ldog mngon sangs rgyas //
NG0280:346: gang gis dbang dang man ngag thob //
NG0280:347: skad gcig tsam gyis mos gyur na //
NG0280:348: 'chi ba zhes ni rnam rtog ste //
NG0280:350: gang zhig 'di la mos pa tsam //
NG0280:352: skye bdun nyid la sangs rgyas 'gyur //
NG0280:353: skye ba gzhan gyis bar ma chod //
NG0280:354: 'di la the tshom le lo spang *//
NG0280:355: brtson 'grus dad ldan can gyis sgrub //
NG0280:356: rgyud 'di rtag tu gsang bar bya //
NG0280:358: b+ha ga wan gyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
NG0280:359: bud+d+ha dang kro d+ha dang kro d+hi dang */
NG0280:361: mkha' 'gro ma rnams yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
NG0280:362: dpal rdo rje gzhon nu thugs rje khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi bshad pa las /
NG0280:363: bstod pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o // // dpal
NG0280:364: rdo rje khros pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi bshad pa
NG0280:365: zhes bya ba rdzogs so // // rgya gar kha
NG0280:366: che'i yul / dur khrod bi sa ka'i rang byung mchod rten rtser /
NG0280:367: dngos grub brnyes pa'i rje btsun rdo rje sems ma dang */
NG0280:368: sgra bsgyur lots+tsha ba 'gar shes rab 'byung zhes bya bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //
NG0280:369: slad nas rje btsun ma de nyid dang sgra bsgyur
NG0280:370: lots+tsha ba 'bro ston rgyal bas bcos te gtan la
